name: Atomera Incorporated
description: Atomera Incorporated is a semiconductor materials and technology company that focuses on enhancing the performance of semiconductor devices. Founded in 2013 and headquartered in Los Gatos, California, Atomera has developed proprietary technologies that aim to improve the efficiency and performance of electronic devices through its flagship product, Mears Silicon Technology (MST). MST is a unique innovation that enables semiconductor manufacturers to enhance their existing processes and improve the performance of devices used in various applications, including mobile devices, data centers, and automotive systems. The company’s mission is to enable the next generation of semiconductor technology, addressing the increasing demand for high-performance computing and energy-efficient solutions. Atomera collaborates with leading semiconductor manufacturers to integrate its technologies into their production lines, significantly impacting the way chips are designed and produced. As the semiconductor industry continues to evolve with trends such as AI, IoT, and 5G, Atomera is positioned at the forefront, providing essential technologies that drive innovation in the sector.
